attributes.action: Consider Tax Exemption for all Military Pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The military pension is a pension that has been earned over a sustained period in the service of HM The Queen.  The Government is requested to remove all tax liability on that pension or at least remove it from being considered as income when establishing tax liability.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to consider Tax Exemption for all Military Pensions.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=military-pension



Her Majesty's Government
